hey guys i wanna ask something, i have 27 in' LED 1080p HD but when i watch any movie of 1080p or we can say BOZX my picture quality is not that clear as there should be in any 1080p movie.... i mean i can see the pixels i hope anybody out there help me... thnx

@kashaf: Is the 27" you're talking about a monitor or a TV? If it's a monitor, to see true HD you need to have it connected to your PC with an HDMI or DVI cable. If not, it's not gonna look good. Now if you're watching it directly on a TV it should be naturally HD

This is the sort of file size you should be looking at if you want great quality 1080p HD movies with surround sound.  Tiny little 2-4GB versions really suffer in high action scenes which Skyfall has a lot of.

With this version, the picture quality looks almost identical to the Blu-ray, even on 1080p screens of 32" and above connected by HDMI cable.  Saves me doing a time-consuming encode of my disc, so thanks to the uploader!
